short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just highlight name of the movie or a game, right click, and choose the a specific website where to look for rating.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest way to quickly find ratings for movies or games on any website you're currently browsing.

Simply highlight the text (name of the movie or game), right-click, and choose a specific website to look for ratings.

* Supports 5 of the most popular and trusted websites for movie and game ratings.

No more copying and pasting the name of a movie or game of unknown quality. Save time and get reviews in seconds.

Search for movie or game ratings with "Quick Search for Ratings."

Currently compatible with:

* csfd.cz
* imdb.com
* themoviedb.org
* rottentomatoes.com
* metacritic.com
